themes.description: This theme covers requests for new features, improvements to existing functionalities, or suggestions related to the app's capabilities and data offerings.
This theme covers problems related to account opening, verification, activation, or other general account management difficulties.
This theme covers reviews alleging fraudulent activities, scams, or unethical practices by the platform or its representatives.
Overall user satisfaction, ease of use, and general positive feedback about the application.
Suggestions for new features, enhancements, or modifications to existing app functionalities.
This theme covers complaints about the difficulty, complexity, or lack of smoothness in performing specific actions or navigating the application.
This theme covers issues related to account setup, verification, data collection, and general account administration.
This theme covers requests or feedback related to services, features, or support specifically for Non-Resident Indian (NRI) users.
This theme covers suggestions for new features, improvements to existing functionalities, or enhancements to the user interface.
This theme includes suggestions for new trading functionalities, improvements to existing trading tools, and requests for specific investment options.
Concerns about the app's authenticity, trustworthiness, or claims of being fake, including issues where funds are perceived to be held unfairly or without proper justification.
Covers requests for specific account details, statements, or historical data.
This theme includes feedback and suggestions related to promotional campaigns, loyalty programs, discounts, and special offers for customers.
This theme covers user inquiries and feedback regarding the availability, variety, and clarity of different investment products and services offered on the platform.
This theme covers feedback related to the visual aesthetics, user interface (UI), and overall design language of the application.
This theme covers feedback related to the availability and range of financial products, instruments, or services offered on the platform.
Reviews expressing satisfaction, appreciation, or general positive sentiment about the application or service.
Reviews describing how the app interferes with other applications or user activities outside of its direct usage.
Issues related to the receipt of dividends, interest, or other expected returns from investments.
Complaints or feedback regarding the design, ease of use, or overall user experience of existing features within the application.
This theme covers complaints related to the app's design, layout, navigation, and overall user experience, including issues with screen flow and default views.
This theme covers issues related to incorrect, misleading, or missing information provided within the application.
This theme covers issues related to data privacy, unauthorized access, security vulnerabilities, and suspicious app behavior.
This theme covers accusations of fraudulent activities, unethical practices, and general loss of trust in the service or platform.
Reviews about features that are absent from the application or platform, limiting user functionality.
Concerns regarding the quality, format, or availability of statements, reports, or other official documents.
Issues or limitations related to account management features like nominee addition, profile updates, or account settings.
Problems with KYC, identity verification, or other account setup and compliance processes.
